actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend the eligibility of certain persons for educational benefits under the GI Bill.

summary.text: Declares that any member of the Women's Air Force Service Pilots (or any other group of similarly situated Federal civilian employees) shall be considered to have been released from such service on the date such member is issued a discharge under the G.I. Bill Improvement Act or on the date of enactment of this Act, whichever occurs later. Provides that such members' eligibility for veterans' educational assistance be available for ten years after their release date.

titles.title: A bill to extend the eligibility of certain persons for educational benefits under the GI Bill.
